name: Cube Filler
description:
Cube Filler

Fill all the empty cubes to solve the puzzles. Sounds easy, right? However, different types of cubes like portals, boosts and barriers creates unique challenges that will test your skills.

The puzzles start off easy, as the game progress more elements are introduced that makes the levels more challenging.

Controls

  •  Left mouse to move or drag the cube.
  • Keyboard arrows or WASD to move the cube.
